notes.text:
An update is available for compiler-rt, lldb, lld, llvm, llvm-toolset, clang, libomp, python-lit.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
LLVM Toolset provides the LLVM compiler infrastructure framework, the Clang
compiler for the C and C++ languages, the LLDB debugger, and related tools for
code analysis.

Bug Fixes:

* clang-tidy does not pick up libstdc++ from gcc-toolset (BZ#2088672)

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: * clang-tidy does not pick up libstdc++ from gcc-toolset
Red Hat CSAF document for RLBA-2022:5340
